[DESCRIPTION]
Max Payne: Collection is a complete set of products, dealing with the 

fate of Max Payne, a talented New York Police Department detective. As 

part of this package includes both the first and second part of the 

famous series of the Finnish team Remedy Studios.

Max Payne is a man with nothing to lose--a fugitive undercover cop 

framed for murder, and now hunted by the cops and the mob. As Payne, 

you'll uncover plot twists, engage in dramatic "bullet-time" 

firefights with thugs, and fight your way through an unforgiving New 

York blizzard. Max can wield a variety of weapons including pistols, 

submachine guns, shotguns, sniper rifles, grenades, and Molotov 

cocktails. Prepare yourself for an involving story combined with slick 

action.
